ygData.subject: Smithing inprovement
ygData.msgSnippet: As par waht information i found in different places i started with metel bits (about 1/2p worth advansed me a point) till skill 21 i think. (i never trained as
ygData.messageBody:
As par waht information i found in different places i started with metel bits
(about 1/2p worth advansed me a point) till skill 21 i think. (i never trained as i
am saving training points [dont ask me why i don't know]) then i started on files
and studs and made 1 point after spending over 4p decided that wasnot even close to
worth it and found scaler molds and started with them they advanced my skill at
about 1p each cause the finshed molds you can sell back at a minimual profit
(acutally a loss i think because of the cost of pisces of ore) i stoped doing this
at skill 41 and was happy with my results (only problem i had was the confusing
molds were visualy identical so i wasted a few in my long trek from 22 to 41) now
i am making skewers and am loseing about 2p per point. if this is the way it goes
oh well.. if not i would like a suggestion to what i should make my skill is 44
int is 70 and cha of 115. i see a pattern here as skill points cost double what
they did before. but i am alright with it as i hunt wisps for cash then purchase my
stuff to make. is anything besides skewers going to raise my skill for less? i
dislike that i fail 90plus percent of the time and never am able to sell the
skewers back.

hope this helps others with there smithing and i would like feedback on if anyting
will advanse me faster for less

Anakri
Mithanial Marr
